verses.verse: Now there was a <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H4480>besides<s%> <S%H905><s%> the <S%H7223>previous<s%> <S%H7458>famine<s%> that had <S%H1961>occurred<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham.<s%> So <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H1642>Gerar,<s%> to <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to him and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Do not <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> <S%H7931>stay<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> I shall <S%H559>tell<s%> you.

<S%H1481>"Sojourn<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> and I will be with you and <S%H1288>bless<s%> you, for to you and to your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H411>these<s%> <S%H776>lands,<s%> and I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> the <S%H7621>oath<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your father <S%H1>Abraham.<s%>

"And I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and will <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H411>these<s%> <S%H776>lands;<s%> and by your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall be <S%H1288>blessed;<s%>

<S%H6118>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> <S%H6963><s%> Me and <S%H8104>kept<s%> My <S%H4931>charge,<s%> My <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> My <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and My <S%H8451>laws.<s%> "
So <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H1642>Gerar.<s%>

When the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> about his <S%H802>wife,<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> "She is my <S%H269>sister,<s%>" for he was <S%H3372>afraid<s%> to <S%H559>say,<s%> "my <S%H802>wife,<s%>" [thinking,] "the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> might <S%H2026>kill<s%> me on <S%H5921>account<s%> of <S%H7259>Rebekah,<s%> for she is <S%H2896>beautiful.<s%>"

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, <S%H3588>when<s%> he had been <S%H8033>there<s%> a <S%H748>long<s%> <S%H3117>time,<s%> that <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8259>looked<s%> out <S%H1157>through<s%> a <S%H2474>window,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> was <S%H6711>caressing<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H7259>Rebekah.<s%>

Then <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> <S%H389>certainly<s%> she is your <S%H802>wife!<s%> <S%H349>How<s%> then did you <S%H559>say,<s%> 'She is my <S%H269>sister<s%>'?" And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3588>"Because<s%> I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6435>'Lest<s%> I <S%H4191>die<s%> on <S%H5921>account<s%> of her.'"

And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> you have <S%H6213>done<s%> to us? <S%H259>One<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> might <S%H4592>easily<s%> have <S%H7901>lain<s%> with your <S%H802>wife,<s%> and you would have <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H817>guilt<s%> upon us."

So <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H6680>charged<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "He who <S%H5060>touches<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> or his <S%H802>wife<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>"

Now <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H2232>sowed<s%> in that <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H4672>reaped<s%> in the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> a <S%H3967>hundredfold.<s%> <S%H8180><s%> And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him,

and the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1431>became<s%> <S%H1431>rich,<s%> and <S%H1980>continued<s%> to <S%H1432>grow<s%> <S%H1432>richer<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H1431>became<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1431>wealthy;<s%>

for he <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H4735>possessions<s%> of <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and <S%H1241>herds<s%> and a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H5657>household,<s%> so that the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H7065>envied<s%> him.

Now <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H875>wells<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> his father's <S%H1>servants<s%> had <S%H5650>dug<s%> in the <S%H2658>days<s%> of <S%H3117>Abraham<s%> his father, the <S%H85>Philistines<s%> <S%H6430>stopped<s%> up by <S%H5640>filling<s%> them with <S%H4390>earth.<s%>
Then <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go<s%> away from us, for you are <S%H3966>too<s%> <S%H6105>powerful<s%> for us."
And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H1980>departed<s%> from <S%H8033>there<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> in the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H1642>Gerar,<s%> and <S%H3427>settled<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

Then <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H2658>dug<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H875>wells<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> had been <S%H2658>dug<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his father <S%H1>Abraham,<s%> for the <S%H85>Philistines<s%> had <S%H6430>stopped<s%> them up <S%H5640>after<s%> the <S%H310>death<s%> of <S%H4194>Abraham;<s%> and he <S%H85>gave<s%> them the <S%H7121>same<s%> <S%H8034>names<s%> <S%H8034>which<s%> his father had <S%H834>given<s%> them.
But when Isaac's <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H2658>dug<s%> in the <S%H5158>valley<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> a <S%H875>well<s%> of <S%H2416>flowing<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%>

the <S%H7462>herdsmen<s%> of <S%H1642>Gerar<s%> <S%H7378>quarreled<s%> with the <S%H7462>herdsmen<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H4325>water<s%> is ours!" So he <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> the <S%H875>well<s%> <S%H6230>Esek,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they <S%H6229>contended<s%> with him.
Then they <S%H2658>dug<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H875>well,<s%> and they <S%H7378>quarreled<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> it <S%H1571>too,<s%> so he <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> it <S%H7856>Sitnah.<s%>

And he <S%H6275>moved<s%> <S%H6275>away<s%> from <S%H8033>there<s%> and <S%H2658>dug<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H875>well,<s%> and they did not <S%H7378>quarrel<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> it; so he <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> it <S%H7344>Rehoboth,<s%> for he <S%H559>said,<s%> "At <S%H3588>last<s%> <S%H6258><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7337>made<s%> <S%H7337>room<s%> for us, and we shall be <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>"
Then he <S%H5927>went<s%> up from <S%H8033>there<s%> to <S%H884>Beersheba.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to him the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "I am the <S%H430>God<s%> of your father <S%H1>Abraham;<s%> Do not <S%H85>fear,<s%> for I am with you. I will <S%H3372>bless<s%> you, and <S%H1288>multiply<s%> your <S%H7235>descendants,<s%> For the <S%H2233>sake<s%> of My <S%H5668>servant<s%> <S%H5650>Abraham.<s%>"

So he <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> upon the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H5186>pitched<s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H8033>there;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> Isaac's <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H3738>dug<s%> a <S%H875>well.<s%>

Then <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H1980>came<s%> to him from <S%H1642>Gerar<s%> with his <S%H4828>adviser<s%> <S%H276>Ahuzzath,<s%> and <S%H6369>Phicol<s%> the <S%H8269>commander<s%> of his <S%H6635>army.<s%>
And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4069>"Why<s%> have you <S%H935>come<s%> to me, since you <S%H8130>hate<s%> me, and have <S%H7971>sent<s%> me <S%H7971>away<s%> from you?"

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> "We <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7200>plainly<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1961>been<s%> with you; so we <S%H559>said,<s%> 'Let there <S%H4994>now<s%> be an <S%H423>oath<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> us, [even] <S%H996>between<s%> you and us, and let us <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with you,

that you will <S%H6213>do<s%> us <S%H518>no<s%> <S%H9567>harm,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as we have not <S%H5060>touched<s%> you and have <S%H6213>done<s%> to you <S%H7534>nothing<s%> but <S%H9185>good,<s%> and have <S%H7971>sent<s%> you <S%H7971>away<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%> You are <S%H6258>now<s%> the <S%H1288>blessed<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>' "
Then he <S%H6213>made<s%> them a <S%H4960>feast,<s%> and they <S%H398>ate<s%> and <S%H8354>drank.<s%>

And in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> they <S%H7925>arose<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H7650>exchanged<s%> <S%H7650>oaths;<s%> then <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> them <S%H7971>away<s%> and they <S%H1980>departed<s%> from him in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about on the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that Isaac's <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> in and <S%H5046>told<s%> him <S%H5921>about<s%> <S%H182><s%> the <S%H875>well<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they had <S%H2658>dug,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "We have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>"
So he <S%H7121>called<s%> it <S%H7656>Shibah;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H884>Beersheba<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And when <S%H6215>Esau<s%> was <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> he <S%H3947>married<s%> <S%H802><s%> <S%H3067>Judith<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H882>Beeri<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> and <S%H1315>Basemath<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H356>Elon<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite;<s%>
and they <S%H1961>brought<s%> <S%H4786>grief<s%> <S%H7307><s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> and <S%H7259>Rebekah.<s%>
